Reference

All functions

check_dim_()

Check if all the inputs are same in dimensions

dt_to_wq()

Convert csv data files into wq formats

format_rfggrid()

Format Delft3D RFGGRID (.grd) file.

GeomVelocity

Geom Velocity

geom_velocity()

Geom for plotting velocity vectors.

get_efdc_nc_dt() melt_nc() has_variable() get_efdc_nc_var() get_efdc_nc_coordinates()

Export grid information to a data.table from the .nc file generated by EE.

nse()

Calculate the Nash-Sutcliffe efficiency (NSE)

plot_efdc_ts()

Generate calibration plots for EFDC exported data.

poly_area()

Calculate the area of the polygon with the given vextices

set_wqbc() generate_wq_abb()

Set water quality boundaries (cwqsrs01-21.inp)

shp_to_ldb()

Convert ESRI shapefile into text format.

theme_efdc()

The theme of the model plot

update_wq_params_value() get_wq_params() get_wq_params_value()

Update the water quality parameters in wq3dwc.inp.

write_ldb()

Function for write .ldb files.

write_wq()

Write .wq files
